title: I.Sicily inscription 000871

date._:
Epig. late 3rd century CE (Manni
                                Piraino); Sarcoph 4th century CE, pref. late (Tusa)

provenanceFound._: Poss. Catacomb of S. Maria di Gesu

graphics.desc: I.Sicily with the permission of the Assessorato Regionale dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana - Dipartimento dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana

museum.name: Museo Archeologico Regionale Antonino Salinas
museum.description: Partially reopened following extensive restoration work. Comprehensive collection of archaeological material, predominantly from the West of the island, with an important Etruscan collection.

location.address: Centre of Palermo, Piazza Olivella 24, 90100 - Palermo
